import React, { useState } from 'react' // useState로만 해보기 function SubmitForm() { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [price, sePrice] = useState(0); const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const [getDate, setGetDate] = useState(''); // 초기값 뭘로?? const [isMemo, setIsMemo] = useState(false); const [memoText, setMemoText] = useState(''); const [newForm, setNewForm] = useState({ id: new Date(), name: '', price: 0, category: '', getDate: '', isMemo: isMemo, memoText: '', repurchase: true, }) return (
setName(event.target.value)}/>
setNewForm(!isMemo)}/> {/* 메모 작성 버튼을 눌렀을 때만 보이도록 */} { isMemo && }
) } export default SubmitForm
